Class LinearSolverDeluxe

java.lang.Object
LinearSolverDeluxe
public class LinearSolverDeluxe
extends java.lang.Object
Linear Solver Deluxe class to solve linear equations. It can use different methods to solve equations.

    • solveEquation

      public double[] solveEquation​(double[][] _LHS, double[] _RHS)
      solveEquation method solves the linear equation bu using a specific method
      Parameters:
      _LHS - represents the values on the left hand side of the equation
      _RHS - represents the values on the right hand side of the equation
      Returns:
      a matrix that contains solution
